title: Pre-Service Elementary Teacher Competency Enhancement Program Through Online Reflective Assignments

context.prior_knowledge: Core mathematics curriculum knowledge and instructional practice experience
context.additional_context: Combining asynchronous learning using digital devices with weekly in-person feedback sessions.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can derive at least three improvement points for teaching methods by writing reflective journals when designing math lessons
Learners can provide at least two specific feedbacks by analyzing peers' lesson cases in online discussion forums
Learners can clearly establish their educational philosophy within 500 characters through reflective assignments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
